relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rales/ronchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, tenderness to palpation in the RLQ, +guarding, normoactive bowel sounds, no palpable masses
relevant_findings.pelvic: Bimanual examination with no cervical motion tenderness
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused

relevant_findings.imaging: Appendix is dilated up to 1.1 cm, with wall thickening, mucosal hyperenhancement and surrounding fat stranding, consistent with appendicitis.
